Academic_Circle_Or_Learning_Circle_key2: This is a very important circle or meeting in which all the students gather/sit together in a circle to discuss the following:-
Academic_Circle_Or_Learning_Circle_key3: Tell about their current topic and their future agenda and their new learning in the previous week.
Academic_Circle_Or_Learning_Circle_key4: TNP’s conduct this circle and they also ask some questions to the students on their respective topics.
Academic_Circle_Or_Learning_Circle_key5: Needs of students that need to be worked for the next week.
Academic_Circle_Or_Learning_Circle_key6: The academic circle is conducted once every week, but it can also be conducted twice a week depending on the need of academics.
Academic_Circle_Or_Learning_Circle_key7: TNP’s update the progress tracker sheet for every student and also in the dashboard.
Academic_Circle_Or_Learning_Circle_key8: Student’s current milestones will be updated on the progress tracker sheets.
